about.title: What is TAT?
about.description: The Thematic Apperception Test (TAT) is a projective psychological test that reveals underlying motives, concerns, and the way people see the social world through stories they make up about ambiguous pictures.

steps.1: You'll be shown a series of 10 ambiguous images
steps.2: For each image, write a story about what you see
steps.3: Include what led to the scene, what's happening now, and what might happen next

test.title: Tell a Story About This Image

validation.story: Please write a story before submitting.
